settings.content: The Expert Ultra Smoothing Hair Serum is powered by QT Charge Technology ™ that enables high-grade ingredients Omega 3, 6 , 9 & Phytosqualan in binding keratin to the hair shaft. This unique technology reduces damage by 27%* and smoothes the hair texture.

- Powered by QT Charge Technology ™ that enables high grade ingredients to seamlessly bind keratin into the hair shaft reducing damage by 27%*


- Enriched with plant derived Omega 3, 6, 9 concentrate and Phytosqualan that restore keratin and smoothen hair texture.


- This daily-use serum nourishes, hydrates, controls frizz and revitalises dull hair.

Ingredients (image with creative)Contains PhytosqualanPlant based moisturising agent.Mimics human sebum, a natural hair lubricant.Hydrates by penetrating easily into the hair shaft.
Forms a protective sheath and prevents further breakage.

Improves elasticity and texture of hair

Treats frizz and split ends.
Contains Omega 3, 6 , 9Plant derived Omega 3, 6, 9 concentrate.Increases the hair elasticity.Strengthens the mane to appear thicker.Restores moisture and softnessAdds shine to dehydrated tresses.Ingredients : Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethiconol and Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Phenyl trimethicone, Linum usitatissimum L.oil and Carthamus tinctorius oil, Phytosqualane, Vitamin E,
Butylated hydroxytoluene, Perfume.

settings.title: How is Ultra Smoothing serum different from other serums?
settings.content: Keratin, which gives structural strength and protection to the hair, is depleted due to a number of  factors leading to damage and dullness. This unique serum is powered by QT Charge Technology (™) that enables high grade ingredients to bind keratin protein to the hair shaft improving the hair texture, smoothing strands, restoring shine and reducing damage by 27% within single use*

settings.title: What are the benefits of using Ultra Smoothing Serum?
settings.content: This daily use serum restores hair vitality and adds instant shine to your hair. It binds keratin to the hair shaft, imparting strength, smoothness and shine to the hair.

settings.title: How to use it?
settings.content: Take a few drops of the serum into your palms, rub them together and apply from the mid-length of your towel-dried, damp hair for best results.
